text:
You can change your Instagram
password at any time

from the settings menu
of the app or website.

Use the clickable sections
below to skip to each method.

The steps for changing
your password on the app
works for both iOS and Android.
Open the Instagram app.

Tap your account icon to
go to your profile page.
Tap the three-horizontal-lines icon.
Then tap "Settings."
Tap "Security."
On the security page, tap "Password."

If you have an email
linked to your account,
a message will pop up saying
that an email has been sent to you
with a link to reset your password.

Open the email that was
sent to you by Instagram,
then click the link in the email.

If you have a phone number
linked to your account,

you will receive a text
with a link instead.
The link will send you to a page
where you can enter a new password.
If you log in to Instagram using Facebook,
you'll need to update your password
through Facebook's settings.
Go to Instagram.com.
Click on the account icon.

From the drop-down menu,
click on "Profile."

Click the settings icon
next to "Edit Profile."
Then click "Change Password."
Enter your current password

and then type the new
password you want to use.
When you're done, click "Change Password."
If you've lost or forgotten your password,
you may need to reset it.
You can do that from the login screen
on the app or website.
On your mobile device,

open the Instagram app so
you see the login screen.
Under the username and password fields,

tap "Get help logging in"
if you're using Android
or "Forgot password" if you're on iOS.

Enter your username, email, or
phone number and tap "Next."
Then you'll get an email or text
with instructions to reset your password.
Go to Instagram.com.

On the login screen under the
username and password fields,
click on "Forgot password."

Enter your email, phone
number, or username,
and then click "Send Login Link."

Then follow the instructions
sent to you via email or text
to reset your password.
Check out more social-media tips
by checking out our social-media playlist,

found in the playlists
tab of this channel page.
